refnamediv.refpurpose: compute a box which surrounds strings

listitem.para: vector of 4 real scalars defining the box.
real scalars, coordinates of the lower-left point of the strings.
Starting from Scilab 5.2, it is possible to write LaTeX or MathML expression.
an integer specifying the font type.
an integer specifying the font size.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: xstringl returns in rect=[x,y,w,h] (upper-left point, width, height) the size of a rectangle in the current graphic scale which would surround the strings str drawn at location x,y (lower-left point).
The result can be approximative when using the Postscript driver.
